title: Update max_tx_gas to 2M for Anchor Lane Optimization
summary:
This proposal updates the feemarket max_tx_gas parameter from 10M to 2M (2,000,000) to enforce anchor lane decentralization.

Rationale:
- 2M gas = 3.3% of a 60M block
- Requires 30+ max-size txs to fill a block (prevents single tx dominance)
- Forces heavy computation off the anchor lane (to PoSeq)
- Prevents governance griefing attacks
- Ensures PoC submissions cannot monopolize blocks
- No smart contracts exist on anchor lane - 2M is sufficient
- Protects lower-end validators from resource exhaustion

The anchor lane exists solely for: staking, governance, PoC, and protocol state. High-throughput smart contracts should run on PoSeq, which commits to this anchor.
